    • raumErstellen

      public java.lang.String raumErstellen​(java.lang.String raumName, java.lang.String password, int spielerAnzahl, Account host) throws PlayerNumberException, RoomAlreadyExistException, java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException, java.io.IOException
      Creates a new Vorraum
      Specified by:
      raumErstellen in interface LobbyIF
      Parameters:
      raumName - to create
      password - of the room
      spielerAnzahl - max spieler number
      host - of the room
      Returns:
      Room url
      Throws:
      PlayerNumberException - if max spieler not between 2 and 5
      RoomAlreadyExistException - another room with same name exists
      java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException - room is already bound in registry
      java.io.IOException - gui update error

    • raumBeitreten

      Specified by:
      raumBeitreten in interface LobbyIF
      Parameters:
      raumName - to join
      password - of the room
      account - to add to room
      Returns:
      String of the vorraum_url
      Throws:
      WrongPasswordException - wrong password of room is given
      FullRoomException - room reached full capacity
      java.io.IOException - gui update error
      RoomDoesntExistException - the room doesn't exist
